*Mantella lowers herself to her knees next to the pod* Mantella: What exact=
ly am I going to be able to do? *Mantella asks Shredder* *Then Drazom and S=
tingtra see Mantella and Shredder with the pod. Stingtra and Drazom run ove=
r to help. Then Drazom looks where Mantella's Pred symbol was and gasps* Dr=
azom: Mantella? what?... Mantella: I got sick of Megatron never giving orde=
rs and I had to take orders from that stupid Quickstrike. But, I'm not agai=
nst you, just....not gonna be around that much. *Drazom stared not understa=
nding why it had to be this horrid way* Drazom: Well, we can still have eac=
h other! *Drazom says and he pulls out a necklace that he made for Mantella=
* Drazom: That's why I was collecting all those things. *Drazom says handin=
g it to Mantella. Then Mantella pushes it away* Drazom: What's wrong, my lo=
ve? what's wrong with showing our feelings for each other? Mantella: Drazom=
, I'm really flatured that you like me but you'll get over it. Drazom: But =
I can't get over love. Mantella: DRAZOM! It's just a crush. They don't last=
! Drazom: This will surely last longer then silly crush! Mantella: No Drazo=
m, I'm afraid it's not! Drazom: No need to be afraid! Come with me to the l=
ake??? Mnatella: NO I WON'T! I'm sorry but I don't have the same feelings f=
or you that you have for me so no more. Drazom: ??????? Mantella: It can't =
happen, ever. *Draom just stared* Drazom: We can stay in the jungle and nev=
er come back! Mantella: DRAZOM!!! *Mantella yells as he tries to drags her =
away* Mantella: I AM HELPING SHREDDER! Drazom: You like him??? Mantella: AA=
HHH!!! NO! IT CAN'T HAPPEN, EVER, PERIOD. *Drazom picked the necklace up of=
f the ground handing it back to Mantellla then converts to beast mode and f=
lies away* Mantella: *SIGH!* Now, let's get this pod. *Stingtra walked over=
 to help with the pod. Stingtra looked at Mantella* Stingtra: Can I take no=
tes? Mantella:...ugh.... *Stingtra lowers herself to her knees to help with=
 the pod*
